title: ‘After 300 Kilometers a Sprint Really Feels Strange and Different’: Milan-San Remo Reactions from the Stars
content:
Jasper Philipsen, Michael Matthews, Tadej Pogačar, Mads Pedersen and others react to a thrilling edition of La Primavera.

Read the full article at ‘After 300 Kilometers a Sprint Really Feels Strange and Different’: Milan-San Remo Reactions from the Stars on Velo.
author: sstokes
